Class LocalDeploymentPlatform.SimpleLocalMessaging

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.AgentComponent
      • tatami.core.agent.messaging.MessagingComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    LocalDeploymentPlatform

    public static class LocalDeploymentPlatform.SimpleLocalMessaging
extends MessagingComponent
    Simple implementation of MessagingComponent, that uses agents' names as their addresses.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentAddress

        public java.lang.String getAgentAddress(java.lang.String agentName,
                               java.lang.String containerName)
        Description copied from class: MessagingComponent
        The method produces the string address of an agent on the same platform, being provided with the agent name and container. // FIXME: what if the container information is out of date.

        This address can subsequently be suffixed with more path elements by using MessagingComponent.makePathHelper(String, String...).

        Specified by:
        getAgentAddress in class MessagingComponent
        Parameters:
        agentName - - the name of the target agent.
        containerName - - the container of the target agent
        Returns:
        the string address of the target agent.

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String target,
                  java.lang.String source,
                  java.lang.String content)
        Description copied from class: MessagingComponent
        Sends a message to another agent, according to the specific implementation.
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in class MessagingComponent
        Parameters:
        target - - the target endpoint of the message.
        source - - the source endpoint of the message.
        content - - the content of the message.
        Returns:
        true if the message was sent successfully.
